content:
There is a note that says
Note: Please do not conduct triage on these runs without discussing how to do so with a release team member first. Thanks!
From time to time I've been grepping for ICEs and assertion failures inside crater reports (this includes all ices, not only "new" ones) and made tickets for those that seemed to be not yet ticketized; is it referring to that?
That's generally fine, what we don't want is someone trying to help by pinging crate authors for regressed crates without an explanation of what they should do etc
(We started adding that note after that happened several times)
oh ok, I see. Thanks for the explanation :)
